title: Deploying maven artifacts should provide a way to use a custom settings.xml file
description:
Maven, and the related maven plugins used by the ANT build system, provide a way to specify a custom settings file describing your maven repositories.

However, the current ANT build system does not provide a way to pass the name of such a settings file to maven.

This issue proposed to add a m2.settings.file ANT property that could be used to specify the settings file.

comments.content: The attached patch adds the feature for master, 7x, 6x, 5x, and 4x branches.
comments.author: Lynn Monson
